text.div:
VhDir Qualification Status Value Set

Codes for documenting the status of a qualification.

This value set includes codes from the following code systems:

  • Include all codes defined in http://hl7.org/fhir/ig/vhdir/CodeSystem/codesystem-credentialstatus

name: VhDir Qualification Status Value Set
title: VhDir Qualification Status Value Set
description: Codes for documenting the status of a qualification.
